urls.title: Dear America, Here Is an In-Depth Foreign Interference Tool Using Data Visualization
urls.description: My dataviz journey from medicine to defending democracy

data.text:
It's one of these stories only life can tell.

In August I started my professional data visualization career as a freelancer. With my first job, I moved from medicine to defending democracy.
